descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]My Mods:
[color=#cc0000][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35361/?]Nature Spell Pack[/url][/color]
[/font][right][img]http://oi57.tinypic.com/fkxkyq.jpg[/img]
[youtube]XcHYQVlsaD8[/youtube][/right][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]Spells[/b]
[spoiler]

Dwarven Automatons are immune to Blood Magic Spells
Spells are affected by vanilla perks.

[color=#666666][size=5]Destruction[/size][/color]
[size=4]-Novice[/size]
Vampiric Drain: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]Absorb [/size][/color][size=1]tot[/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=1] points of health per second from the target.[/size][/color]
[size=4]-Apprentice[/size]
Vampiric Bolt: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]A bolt that absorb [/size][/color][size=1]tot[/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=1] points of health.[/size][/color]
Vampiric Rune: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]Cast on a nearby surface, it explodes and absorb [/size][/color][size=1]tot[/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=1] points of health.[/size][/color]
[size=4]-Adept[/size]
Vampiric Blast: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]An explosion that absorb [/size][/color][size=1]tot[/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=1] points of health in a 10 foot radius.[/size][/color]
Vampiric Cloak: [size=1][color=#b6b6b6]For [/color]tot[color=#b6b6b6] seconds,  absorb [/color]tot[color=#b6b6b6] points of health per second from opponents in melee range.[/color][/size]
[size=4]-Expert[/size]
Vampiric Wave: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]A wave that absorb [/size][/color][size=1]tot[/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=1] points of health and push back small targets.[/size][/color]
[size=4]-Master[/size]
 Vampiric Storm: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]A powerfull storm that absorb [/size][/color][size=1]tot[/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=1] points of health per second from the target.[/size][/color]

[color=#666666][size=5]Conjuration[/size][/color]
[size=3]-Apprentice[/size]
Conjure Gargoyle: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]Summons a Gargoyle for [/size][/color][size=1]tot[/size][color=#b6b6b6][size=1] seconds wherever the caster is pointing.[/size][/color]

[color=#666666][size=5]Spell Merchant[/size][/color]
Spell Tomes are sold by [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Sybille_Stentor]Sybille Stentor[/url].
You can buy Adept Spell Tomes when you reach lvl 50 in destruction
You can buy Expert Spell Tome when you reach lvl 75 in destruction
To be able to buy the master spell you must complete the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Destruction_Ritual_Spell]Destrucion Ritual Spell[/url] quest.[/spoiler]
[b]Perks[/b]

[spoiler]
[color=#666666][size=5]Destruction[/size][/color]
Augmented Blood Magic: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]Blood  magic spells absorb 25% more health.[/size][/color]
Blood Curse: [color=#b6b6b6][size=1]Killing enemies with blood magic reanimates them.[/size][/color] [/spoiler]
[b]Manual[/b]
[spoiler]-Put the files in your Skyrim data folder.
[b]Nexus Mod Manager[/b]
-Click the 'Download with Manager' button.
[b]Uninstall[/b]
-Delete the files.[/spoiler]
[/font]
[b]Additional Notes
[/b][spoiler]
-I don't want to use health instead of magicka... I could do a standalone version.[/spoiler]
author: cansit
